page.title: 19A DAY AT SCHOOL
page.content: School starts at 9.00am.The roll is called and some days we have assembly. Then we do our spellings. After this we do Maths or Reading Activity until break-time at 10.30am .We go outside and play football until 10.45am.Next we write our homework down. It is explained for us and then we do Creative Writing ,English or Poetry but we sometimes have the computer to work with.At 12.00 noon we stop work for lunch.You can go home for lunch, have a packed lunch of anything to eat or stay and have a school dinner.We play outside until 12.45pm. We then work until 2.00pm and then we change classes from 2.00pm to 3.00pm and do either needlework for girls or craft for boys.
